alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 12:25AM CDT until July 24 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jo Daviess County in northwestern Illinois... Northwestern Carroll County in northwestern Illinois... Jackson County in east central Iowa... Dubuque County in northeastern Iowa... Jones County in east central Iowa... Eastern Delaware County in northeastern Iowa... East central Linn County in east central Iowa... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1225 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Luxemburg to Langworthy, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dubuque, Anamosa, Galena, Asbury, Dyersville, Monticello, Bellevue, Cascade, Epworth, East Dubuque, Farley, Peosta, Hanover, Earlville, Elizabeth, Hopkinton, Andrew, New Vienna, Colesburg and Worthington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
